content.title: Project Structure Reorganization - October 2025
content.description: Complete project restructure following industry best practices. Improved organization, maintainability, and developer experience.
content.decision: Reorganized entire project into logical directories: src/app/ (applications), docs/ (documentation), tests/ (all tests), scripts/ (automation)
content.rationale: Previous structure had 49+ files at root level, causing navigation confusion. New structure follows industry standards and improves maintainability.
content.context: All agents must use new file paths. HTML apps are in src/app/, docs in docs/, tests in tests/
content.impact: All agents must update their file path references

agent_notes.primary_developer: Use src/app/ for HTML files, docs/ for documentation
agent_notes.sentinel: Security test files moved from .sentinel-tests/ to tests/sentinel/
agent_notes.documentation_writer: All documentation now in docs/ directory
